title: AbstractFacility

FacilityID.description: A system-specified unique identifier of a Facility.

FacilityTypeID.description: The definition of a kind of capability to perform a business function or a service.

FacilityOperator.description: The history of operator organizations of the facility.

InitialOperatorID.description: A reference to a FacilityOperator array object ('FacilityOperatorID') that corresponds to the first historical operator of this facility. If dates are complete and accurate for every object in FacilityOperator array, InitialOperatorID should correspond to the FacilityOperator array object with the minimum EffectiveDateTime.
InitialOperatorID.title: Initial Operator ID

CurrentOperatorID.description: A reference to a FacilityOperator array object ('FacilityOperatorID') that corresponds to the operator of this facility at the present time. If dates are complete and accurate for every object in FacilityOperator array, CurrentOperatorID should correspond to the FacilityOperator array object with no TerminationDateTime.
CurrentOperatorID.title: Current Operator ID

DataSourceOrganisationID.description: The main source of the header information.

SpatialLocation.description: The spatial location information such as coordinates,CRS information.

GeoContexts.description: List of geographic entities which provide context to the facility.  This may include multiple types or multiple values of the same type.

OperatingEnvironmentID.description: Identifies the Facility's general location as being onshore vs. offshore.

FacilityNameAlias.description: Alternative names, including historical, by which this facility is/has been known.

FacilityState.description: The history of life cycle states the facility has been through.

FacilityEvent.description: A list of key facility events.

FacilitySpecification.description: facilitySpecification maintains the specification like slot name, wellbore drilling permit number, rig name etc.
